name: Sagefy
description: Adaptive, collaborative, and open learning platform.

scripts.start: npm run clean && concurrently -p "[{name}]" --names copy-statics,copy-fonts,watch-styles,watch-scripts "npm run copy-statics" "npm run copy-fonts" "npm run watch-styles" "npm run watch-scripts"
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run prep-scripts && concurrently -p "[{name}]" --names lint-scripts,run-tests "npm run lint-scripts" "npm run run-tests"
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && concurrently -p "[{name}]" --names copy-statics,copy-fonts,compress-styles,compress-scripts "npm run copy-statics" "npm run copy-fonts" "npm run compress-styles" "npm run compress-scripts"
scripts.copy-statics: cp -a app/images/* distribution/ && cp -a app/*.{html,txt,ico} distribution/
scripts.compress-styles: npm run build-styles && cleancss distribution/index.css -o distribution/index.css
scripts.compress-scripts: npm run build-scripts && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output distribution/index.js -- distribution/index.js
scripts.prep-scripts: concurrently -p "[{name}]" --names build-styleguide,compile-content "npm run build-styleguide" "npm run compile-content"

author: Sagefy
